In Fulfillment of the Covenant between the Father and the Son 


     Christ was not alone in making His great sacrifice. It was the fulfillment of the covenant made between Him and His Father before the foundation of the world was laid. With clasped hands they had entered into the solemn pledge that Christ would become the surety for the human race if they were overcome by Satan's sophistry. Youth's Instructor, June 14, 1900, p. 186. ("The Price of our Redemption")
